article_title: Obamacare's Impact on Rising Health Care Costs
article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: On today's “Single Best Chart,” Bloomberg's Brendan Greeley examines a chart showing U.S. health care spending growth. He speaks on “Bloomberg Surveillance.” (Source: Bloomberg)
